channel.title: Kouensai Village!
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Kouensai Village!" - about a week and a half old already in the war has abut 18 members and we are in need of a few more for jonin and black market

item.title: Re: Kouensai Village!
item.content:encoded:
Kouensai is a NRF village with over 40 upgrades that include

  1. Ninja-Mas Tree
  2. Party House
  3. Jonin Council
  4. Natural Research Facility
  5. Tasty Ramen Shop
  6. Pass Permits
  7. Arms Depot
  8. Sand Village Trading Post
  9. War Room
  10. General Store
  11. BurgerNinja
  12. Potion Palace
  13. Forest Trail
  14. Quiet Glade
  15. Ninja Cooking School
  16. Robot Guards
  17. Fanboy Stink Moat
  18. Undead Guards
  19. Magic Academy
  20. Pose Training

we have over 400k ryo and are waiting to hit 30 members (1 or 2 members if someone goes idle) so we can buy Enticement Altar in a few days.. so if you want some player kaiju drops head on over =)

we also have a few super rares in the storehouse if you desire payment for your stay (2 weeks at least}

item.title: Re: Kouensai Village!
item.content:encoded: i will just wait 5 days coz im on holiday k

item.title: Re: Kouensai Village!
item.content:encoded: well kouensai just bought our jonin council if you want to come enjoy it your more than welcome =)

item.title: Kouensai Village!
item.content:encoded: about a week and a half old already in the war has abut 18 members and we are in need of a few more for jonin and black market. we can afford them both money wise and resource wise so help us out mmk? =) also for the first to apply off wiki we will give a permanent item but you have to stat that your from the wiki page =)
